QuestData.Title: Besting a Boar
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the boars they have here? Bigger than I am! Let's get one of them, why not?$B$BYou're going to have to head to Gorgrond for that task. Way out in the desolate regions, you'll find the ones we're lookin' for.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Boar Lasso on a Young Rocktusk and follow it until it is tamed.
